bestsellers.name: Noodle Strap Kurti
bestsellers.description: Elegant and stylish noodle strap kurti with intricate detailing, perfect for a chic look..
bestsellers.product_detail: A noodle strap kurti is a stylish and modern variation of the traditional kurti, featuring thin spaghetti-like straps instead of regular sleeves. It offers a chic and elegant look, making it perfect for casual outings, festive occasions, or summer wear.
